text:
Apologies for the delayed response! Thanks a lot, I will send you over the new cuts of the reels when I have completed them! Here is a part of that music video I am currently working on: <https://drive.google.com/open?id=1qCttbonc1q6OVUSBZXVNoVP38VfZV7mf>

Ah ok, that is good to know, I will stick to Nuke for now and trying to understand as much of that software as I can. I am yet to work with deep compositing inside Nuke, and am just trying to wrap my head around how it works. Is this something that you work with much on a day to day basis?
